title: [Large-scale] Online Learning Environment Design for STEM Education Innovation: Integrated Pedagogy and Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics) concepts and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing STEM-based project implementation capabilities for current practitioners to solve social issues

learning_goals: Learners can design a process to analyze complex social issues using STEM methodologies via VR simulations.
Learners can complete team-based problem-solving projects with a success rate of over 80% using collaboration tools in an online learning environment.
Learners can interpret data visualization and simulation results in STEM fields using digital learning objects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
